text: ==Major National Parties== * Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) * Indian National Congress (INC) ==Minor National-Level Parties== * Nationalist Congress Party (NCP) by Sharad Pawar, Churchill Alemao, and Jose Philip D'Souza * Trinamool Congress (TMC) led by Mamata Banerjee, Late Wilfred de Souza * Shiv Sena (SS) led by Uddhav Thackeray * Aam Admi Party (AAP) led by Arvind Kejriwal and Elvis Gomes ==Regional Parties== * Goa Forward Party (GFP) led by Vijai Sardesai * Maharashtrawadi Gomantak Party (MGP) led by Sudin Dhavalikar * United Goans Party (UGP) led by Atanasio Monserrate * United Goans Democratic Party (UGDP) led by Jorson Fernandes * Goa Suraksha Manch (GSM) led by Subhash Velingkar and Anand Shirodkar * Goa Praja Party (GPP) led by Pandurang Raut * Goa Su-Raj Party (GSRP) led by Miccky Pacheco and Mathias Xavier Vaz * Goa Vikas Party (GVP) led by Lyndon Monteiro * Goa Democratic People Front (GDPF) (also known as the Goa Democratic Party or Goa People Front), led by Dayanand Narvekar. ==Defunct Regional Parties== * United Goans Party (Sequiera Group), led by Late Dr. Jack de Sequeira * United Goans Party (Furtado Group), led by Late Alvaro de Loyola Furtado * United Goans Party (Naik Group), led by Late Babu Naik * Frente Popular, led by Late Bertha Menezes Braganza * Gomant Lok Pokx, led by Late Mathany Saldanha * Goa People's Party, led by Late Luis Proto Barbosa * Goa Congress, led by Late Wilfred de Souza * Goa Rajiv Congress Party, led by Late Wilfred de Souza * Goa People's Congress, led by Francisco Sardinha * Save Goa Front, led by Churchill Alemao * Indian National Congress (Sheik Hassan), led by Sheikh Hassan Haroon Category:Political parties in Goa
title: Political Parties in Goa
